title: My Lady, Please Become My Heroine! - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Abusive Characters   Apathetic Protagonist   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Charismatic Protagonist   Child Abuse   Childcare   Clever Protagonist   Confinement   Cute Children   Different Social Status   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Kuudere   Loyal Subordinates   Maids   Manipulative Characters   Master-Servant Relationship   Mob Protagonist   Nobles   Power Struggle   Proactive Protagonist   Reincarnated in Another World   Schemes And Conspiracies   Second Chance   Tragic Past
author: Dal-gong-bang   달공방
description:
After dying from overwork in her previous life, Beth finds herself in the world of a novel she was reading. 

She is reincarnated as an extra character, a maid in the house of the novel’s villain, the wicked Lady Claire.

Yet, unlike what she had read in the novel, Claire’s situation seemed worse than what she imagined. Beth witnesses the pain a young Claire had to endure, being abused and locked up in a tower. Therefore, Beth decides to stop her from becoming the novel’s antagonist.>
